headline: Jim Cramer Calls Wells Fargo CEO “Terrific”
summary: Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer highlighted recently. Cramer talked quite positively about the firm’s CEO, as he remarked: “Now we gotta go down to the companies that have been buying back stock at a 4% clip annually to find the two that I want to pound the table […]

headline: Will Expanded Corporate Lending and New Debt Facilities Shift Wells Fargo's (WFC) Growth Narrative?
summary: Earlier this week, Wells Fargo announced a series of fixed-income offerings, including both fixed and floating rate senior notes, as well as its role in leading a new US$250 million debt facility for Aequum Capital Financial, LLC. These developments follow the recent lifting of Wells Fargo’s asset cap, positioning the bank to prioritize growth in corporate lending, wealth management, and investment banking partnerships. Next, we’ll explore how Wells Fargo’s expanded financing capabilities...
